code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @return {Integer}
def incremovable_subarray_count(nums)
    n = nums.length
    lis_left = Array.new(n, 1)
    lis_right = Array.new(n, 1)
    total = 0

    # Compute LIS ending at each index from the left
    for i in 0...n
        for j in 0...i
            if nums[i] > nums[j]
                lis_left[i] = [lis_left[i], lis_left[j] + 1].max
            end
        end
    end

    # Compute LIS starting at each index from the right
    for i in (0...n).to_a.reverse
        for j in (i+1...n).to_a.reverse
            if nums[i] > nums[j]
                lis_right[i] = [lis_right[i], lis_right[j] + 1].max
            end
        end
    end

    # Count subarrays that can be removed to make the array strictly increasing
    for i in 0...n
        total += [lis_left[i], lis_right[i]].min
    end

    total
end
